latestIgtvVideos.caption:
🚨 GIVEAWAY CLOSED 🚨 
Here is your chance to win our Limited Time Sodas Orange Cream 🍊🍦 and Fruit Punch 🍓🍉 🤜! Enter now before your chances melt away 🫠
 
Contains 0% Juice
 
Here's how to enter via Instagram:
1️⃣ Follow us @zevia
2️⃣ Like this post!
3️⃣ Tag a friend – each tag counts as an entry 👯
4️⃣ Use the hashtag #ZeviaSunnyDays when commenting on this post!
 
To Enter via Email: Email your full name, phone number, and date of birth to social@zevia.com Email entries must be received during the promotion period. Limit one (1) entry per email.
 
Must be 18 or older and a US resident to participate in this #giveaway. The giveaway begins today June 8, and ends June 10. Winners will be notified via DM. Best of luck, everyone!

ABBREVIATED RULES: NO PURCHASE NECESSARY TO ENTER OR WIN. PURCHASE DOES NOT IMPROVE ODDS OF WINNING. Void where prohibited by law Zevia® Sunny Days Giveaway begins at 12:01 a.m. EST on June 8, 2022, and ends at 11:59 p.m. EST on June 10, 2022 . Open only to legal residents of the 50 U.S. and D.C. who are at least 18 (19 years or older in AL and NE; 21 years or older in MS) at the time of entry. Odds of winning depend on the number of eligible entries received. For complete details, including free method of entry and a list of participating theatres, see the Official Rules at
www.zevia.com/blogs/news/zevia-sunny-days-giveaway Sponsored by Zevia LLC, 15821 Ventura Boulevard, Suite 145, Los Angeles, CA 91436.

Congrats to our winners: blogblossom01, c1era23x, and smokeysausages

GIVEAWAY CLOSED 
We're giving away a case of Zevia Soda to 10 lucky winners! And, if you've won, share the love by choosing a friend to receive a free case.
 
Here's how to enter:
1. Follow @zevia 
2. Like & Save this #Giveaway Post ❤️
3. Tag your friend in a comment below that helps you hit your goals – each tag counts as an entry!
 
Enter via email: Email your full name, phone number, and date of birth to social@zevia.com. Email entries must be received during the Promotion Period. Limit one (1) entry per email received. 

Must be 18 or older and a US resident to participate in this #giveaway. The giveaway begins today, February 2, and ends on February 4. Winners will be notified via DM on Monday, 2/7! Best of luck, everyone!

Abbreviated Rules: NO PURCHASE NECESSARY TO ENTER OR WIN. A PURCHASE DOES NOT IMPROVE ODDS OF WINNING. Void where prohibited by law. Zevia® [Share the Flavor Giveaway] begins at 12:01 a.m. EST on February 2, 2022 and ends at 11:59 p.m. EST on February 4, 2022. Open only to legal residents of the 50 U.S. and D.C. who are at least 18 (19 years or older in AL and NE; 21 years or older in MS) at the time of entry. Odds of winning depend on the number of eligible entries received. For complete details, including free method of entry and a list of participating theatres, see the Official Rules at https://www.zevia.com/blogs/news/zevia-share-the-flavor-giveaway. Sponsored by Zevia LLC, 15821 Ventura Boulevard, Suite 145, Los Angeles, CA 91436.

latestPosts.caption: He just became our Jelly Roll Model @jellyroll615
The world is full of fakes. Your soda shouldn’t be one of them. Get the fake out of here with Zevia—zero sugar, naturally sweet, and full of flavor.
Artificial intelligence can be … weird. Artificial ingredients? Don’t even get us started. Get the fake outta here with naturally delicious zero sugar soda.
News travels fast — our biggest sale of the summer is here! Save up to 35% on Zevia Soda, Tea, and Energy on @amazon, July 8–11 only. Don't miss it!

Zevia x @yomamasfoods 4th OF JULY GIVEAWAY 🇺🇸 
See official rules and all forms of entry at: bit.ly/3HtpwMt

Your next backyard BBQ deserves better. No fake flavors or ingredients — just tasty sips and sauces, courtesy of Zevia and Yo Mama’s. We're partnering to give you the chance to win 6-packs of Zevia Creamy Root Beer, Orange, and Dr. Zevia, along with a set of Yo Mama's Grilling Keto Condiment Gift Set! 5 lucky winners will be selected.

Here’s how to enter:
+ FOLLOW us @Zevia and @yomamasfoods
+ LIKE this post
+ TAG two friends you're gonna grill with!

GIVEAWAY CLOSED!

The summer of Strawberry Lemon Burst is officially on. 🍓🍋 To celebrate, we’re giving away 10 custom Zevia kits — each one packed with a film camera to capture your favorite summer moments, a stylish compact, and a restock of our brand-new, refreshingly bold flavor. It’s your chance to get the fake outta summer — enter now and make it your most memorable one yet!

Per my last email: DO NOT JUST COPY AND PASTE THIS. Write an original caption in your own words and tag our retailers @sprouts, @albertsons, and @amazon. Make it look tasty and beautiful but in an approachable, relatable way. Specifically, highlight Strawberry Lemon Burst since it is our new summer release. Have fun with it!

-Brandon

latestPosts.caption: Some behind-the-scenes snaps from our Strawberry Lemon Burst shoot, captured on custom-painted film cams 🍓📸🍋 We’re sending these babies out to Zevia fans across the country — can’t wait to see the sweet (and zero sugar) moments you capture this summer!

This summer, your memories should be sweet — and your drinks zero sugar.

Strawberry Lemon Burst is bringing real flavor (with none of the fake stuff) to every BBQ, picnic, and pool chair within reach 🌤 Available online and in stores now!
